about.title: About Me
about.summary1: Passionate about crafting scalable, intelligent business solutions that leverage AI, automation, and modern web technologies. With expertise in full-stack development and AI systems, I build platforms that solve real-world problems.
about.summary2: Always exploring emerging technologies and best practices to stay at the forefront of software engineering. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and collaborating with teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.summary3: I'm passionate about creating scalable web applications and delivering exceptional user experiences. With expertise in both frontend and backend development, I enjoy working on full-stack projects that challenge me to think creatively and solve complex problems.
about.summary4: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community through tutoring and mentoring.
about.educationDegree: BSc in Information Engineering & Distributed Systems
about.educationDescription: Focused on distributed systems, software engineering, and information technology fundamentals.
